pageProduct.name: QV Flare Up Cream 100G Eczema Prone
pageProduct.description:
General Information

To help relieve the symptoms of eczema and dermatitis flare ups.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Avoid eyes. For external use only. If irritation occurs, wash affected area and discontinue use.  Keep out of reach of children.  Store below 30°C.

Always read the label and use only as directed.  If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.

Common Uses

• An emollient cream to treat the symptoms of atopic eczema and dermatitis.
• Contains glycerol to help improve suppleness, reduce roughness, and help improve barrier function.
• Free from lanolin, propylene glycol, and fragrance.

Ingredients

Liquid paraffin 10%, glycerin 10%, petroleum jelly 5%, phenoxyethanol 1%, povidone 1%, parabens 0.3%, benzalkonium chloride 0.1%. (w/w).

Directions

Apply to affected areas three times daily, particularly after showering, bathing and at night. Avoid soap as it may irritate sensitive skin.
